ValidationRule.description: The default actions (create, edit, delete) can only be accessed if SObject Type is specified. Otherwise, the action cannot be applied.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(ISCHANGED(IsCUDActions__c), IsCUDActions__c == true, ISBLANK(SObjectType__c)), TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CUD actions can only be used if an SObject is specified.
